conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway rendering with consistent geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation; clean cutaway and clear interior volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Most room adjacencies and wall positions are accurate. Some slight variation in the proportions of the smaller utility/bathroom spaces.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement highly faithful to the plan. Kitchen and bedroom fixtures correctly represented as geometric blocks.

visual_clarity.notes: Very high clarity; no text contamination. Soft shadows and consistent materials aid readability.

detected_errors.description: Some door swing directions on the 2D plan are represented as solid door slabs in the 3D model.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that accurately translates the complex floor plan into a clean, geometric isometric model.
